about_the_game:
Ninja Ming is a precision platformer with a teleportation twist. Play as Ming the ninja and take on the Path of Transcendence, with style. 

We designed the core mechanics of teleportation to explore a more mobile, flexible experience. If this sounds right up your alley, please add to your wishlist! 

Dash? Flash!

Throw out your Flash kunai, and instantly teleport to its location - that's the first move in your "space ninjutsu".

Learn various Flash skills and master different ninja tools to glide through different scenarios,  teleport past hardcore platforming challenges, dodge enemy bullets, and finally finish the Path of Transcendence!

Respawn Ninjutsu

You may die many times before you become a true master ninja, but with the respawn ninjutsu, you can restart in a flash in every screen. Remember, death is not failure. Death paves your path to growth.

Plan as You Go

Be flexible not just in your movement, but also in your strategy! As you go further, there will be more challenges and obstacles to overcome. Analyze your surroundings and use your skillset to plan the best route - pull off stylish movement combos to keep going!

Grow & Master

The game does not have any form of stats growth. It'll only be you and your controls. Keep growing, and you shall master precision, speed, and style!

Game Features:

  • Tight controls for both movement and skills

  • Instant restart: Every second counts!

  • 4 Zones: Forest, Wind, Mountain, Fire

  • 100+ screens to train you into a master ninja

  • Stylish electronic ninja music (composed by 4 Channels Club) to help keep your cool

  • Bonus screens: it won't be easy. Rewards? Scrolls! (collectibles)

  • Scroll chamber Portal: Unlock after finishing the game. Transport you to a random missing scroll screen right away!

  • Shadow mode: Your best time shown as a shadow

  • Easter Eggs Alert!
